trans-unit.source: Exposes a file within isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 公开独立存储中的文件。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to read, write and create files in isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于读取、 写入和独立存储中创建文件。

trans-unit.source: Since this class extends <xref:System.IO.FileStream>, you can use an instance of IsolatedStorageFileStream in most situations where a <xref:System.IO.FileStream> might otherwise be used, such as to construct a <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> or <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 由于此类扩展<xref:System.IO.FileStream>，你可以使用在大多数情况下的 IsolatedStorageFileStream 实例其中<xref:System.IO.FileStream>否则可能会使用，例如，构造<xref:System.IO.StreamReader>或<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>。</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader> </xref:System.IO.FileStream> </xref:System.IO.FileStream>

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 完成后使用类型的操作后，你应释放类型直接或间接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，使用一种语言构造如`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 独立的存储也无法供[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files.
trans-unit.target: 请改用中的应用程序数据类`Windows.Storage`中均包括命名空间[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)]API 来存储本地数据和文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Application data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[应用程序数据](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175)Windows 开发人员中心中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an object giving access to the file designated by path in the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例给指定的文件的访问的对象 path 中指定 mode 。

trans-unit.source: The isolated store that is used is scoped by the current executing assembly's identity and that of the application domain in which it is running.
trans-unit.target: 使用独立存储区的作用范围由当前正在执行程序集的标识和在其中运行的应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: This store will remain open only for the lifetime of the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object.
trans-unit.target: 此存储将仅的整个生存期内保持打开<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: To specify a different isolated storage scope, or to allow the store to remain open (so multiple <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> objects can be opened from it), use the form of the constructor that accepts an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> object.
trans-unit.target: 要指定不同的独立的存储作用域，或要允许要保持打开状态的存储区 (因此多个<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象可从它中打开)，使用接受的构造函数的形式<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>对象。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created, an existing one used, and so on.
trans-unit.target: `mode`参数指示是否应创建新的文件、 一个现有使用，等等。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and can cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 当你使用特定的区域性设置进行编译的一组字符，并检索这些具有不同的区域性设置的相同字符时，字符可能无法解释和可能会导致引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The relative path of the file within isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 独立存储区内文件的相对路径。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The path is badly formed.
trans-unit.target: path 格式有误。

trans-unit.source: The path is .
trans-unit.target: The path is .

trans-unit.source: The directory in path does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 中的目录 path 不存在。

trans-unit.source: No file was found and the mode is set to
trans-unit.target: 未找到文件和 mode 设置为

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class giving access to the file designated by path, in the specified mode, with the kind of access requested.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例给指定的文件的访问的类 path ，在指定 mode ，与类型的 access 请求。

trans-unit.source: The isolated store that is used is scoped by the current executing assembly's identity and that of the application domain in which it is running.
trans-unit.target: 使用独立存储区的作用范围由当前正在执行程序集的标识和在其中运行的应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: This store will remain open only for the lifetime of the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object.
trans-unit.target: 此存储将仅的整个生存期内保持打开<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: To specify a different isolated storage scope, or to allow the store to remain open (so multiple <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> objects can be opened from it), use the form of the constructor that accepts an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> object.
trans-unit.target: 要指定不同的独立的存储作用域，或要允许要保持打开状态的存储区 (因此多个<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象可从它中打开)，使用接受的构造函数的形式<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>对象。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created or an existing one used.
trans-unit.target: `mode`参数指示是否应创建一个新文件或一个现有使用。

trans-unit.source: The `access` parameter includes read-only, read/write, and write-only.
trans-unit.target: `access`参数包含只读的读/写和只写。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and can cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 当你使用特定的区域性设置进行编译的一组字符，并检索这些具有不同的区域性设置的相同字符时，字符可能无法解释，并可能导致异常引发。

trans-unit.source: The relative path of the file within isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 独立存储区内文件的相对路径。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The path is badly formed.
trans-unit.target: path 格式有误。

trans-unit.source: The path is .
trans-unit.target: The path is .

trans-unit.source: No file was found and the mode is set to .
trans-unit.target: 未找到文件和 mode 设置为 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class giving access to the file designated by path, in the specified mode, and in the context of the specified by isf.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例给指定的文件的访问的类 path ，在指定 mode ，和的上下文中指定的 isf 。

trans-unit.source: isf does not have a quota.
trans-unit.target: isf没有配额。

trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.IO.FileShare"></xref> values
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.IO.FileShare"></xref>值

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref> buffer size.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"> </xref>缓冲区大小。

trans-unit.source: The path is badly formed.
trans-unit.target: path 格式有误。

trans-unit.source: The path is .
trans-unit.target: The path is .

trans-unit.source: No file was found and the mode is set to .
trans-unit.target: 未找到文件和 mode 设置为 。

trans-unit.source: isf does not have a quota.
trans-unit.target: isf没有配额。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 开始异步读。

trans-unit.source: The current position in the stream is updated when you issue the asynchronous read or write, not when the I/O operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当不是在 I/O 操作完成时发出的异步读取或写入时，将更新流中的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> with this <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to find out how many bytes were read.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A>与此<xref:System.IAsyncResult>若要了解已读取的字节。</xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to read data into.
trans-unit.target: 要将数据读入的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in `buffer` at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 中的字节偏移量`buffer`从此处开始读取。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 最大读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the asynchronous read operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成的异步读取操作时要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is optional.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 异步读取的状态。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object that represents the asynchronous read, which is possibly still pending.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>的对象，表示异步读取时，可能仍处于挂起状态。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.IAsyncResult> must be passed to this stream's <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndRead*> method to determine how many bytes were read.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.IAsyncResult>必须传递到此流的<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndRead*>方法以确定已读取的字节数。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndRead*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: This can be done either by the same code that called BeginRead or in a callback passed to BeginRead.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用 BeginRead 的相同代码或在传递给 BeginRead 回调中完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous read was attempted past the end of the file.
trans-unit.target: 异步读取试图超出文件末尾。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write.
trans-unit.target: 开始异步写。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object is writable, writing at the end of the stream expands the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象是可写的在流末尾写入将扩展的流。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The current position in the stream is updated when you issue the asynchronous read or write, not when the I/O operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当不是在 I/O 操作完成时发出的异步读取或写入时，将更新流中的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A> with the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object that this method returns to find out how many bytes were written.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A>与<xref:System.IAsyncResult>对象，此方法返回若要了解编写多少个字节。</xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write data to.
trans-unit.target: 要将数据写入的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in `buffer` at which to begin writing.
trans-unit.target: 中的字节偏移量`buffer`在此处开始写入。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 最大写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the asynchronous write operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 要异步写入操作完成后调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is optional.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous write.
trans-unit.target: 异步写的状态。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents the asynchronous write, which is possibly still pending.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，它表示可能仍处于挂起状态的异步写入。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.IAsyncResult> must be passed to this stream's <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite*> method to ensure that the write is complete, then frees resources appropriately. This can be done either by the same code that called <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite*> or in a callback passed to <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite*>.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.IAsyncResult>必须传递到此流的<> *1> 方法，以确保写入操作已完成，然后相应地释放资源。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>这可以通过调用的相同代码<> *1> 或传递给<xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite*>.</xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite*>回调

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous write was attempted past the end of the file.
trans-unit.target: 异步写试图超出文件末尾。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the file can be read.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示是否可以读取该文件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object can be read.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来确定是否<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>可以读取对象。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象可以是读取; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether seek operations are supported.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示查找支持操作。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object supports seek operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来确定是否<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象支持查找操作。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object supports seek operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象支持查找操作; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether you can write to the file.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示是否可以写入该文件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object can be written.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来确定是否<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>可以写入对象。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object can be written; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象可以是写入; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to true.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>调用与受保护的 Dispose 方法`disposing`参数设置为 true。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes Dispose with `disposing` set to false.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用与 Dispose`disposing`设置为 false。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>引用。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>每个引用对象的方法。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous read request.
trans-unit.target: 结束挂起的异步读取的请求。

trans-unit.source: EndRead must be called exactly once on every <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object from <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginRead%2A>, and calling EndRead is the only way to know how many bytes were read from the <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 必须在上一次调用 EndRead 每个<xref:System.IAsyncResult>对象<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginRead%2A>，并且调用 EndRead 知道<xref:System.IO.Stream>。</xref:System.IO.Stream>读取的多少字节数的唯一办法</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginRead%2A></xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: EndRead will block until the I/O operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: EndRead 将阻止，直到 I/O 操作已完成。

trans-unit.source: The pending asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: 挂起的异步请求。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes read from the stream, between zero and the number of requested bytes.
trans-unit.target: 从流，介于&0; 与请求的字节数之间中读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Streams will only return zero at the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 流仅将返回零在流末尾。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, they will block until at least one byte is available.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它们将阻止到至少&1; 个字节可用之前。

trans-unit.source: The asyncResult is .
trans-unit.target: The asyncResult is .

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous write.
trans-unit.target: 结束异步写入。

trans-unit.source: EndWrite must be called exactly once on every <xref:System.IAsyncResult> from <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 必须在每个<xref:System.IAsyncResult><xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginWrite%2A>.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginWrite%2A>从</xref:System.IAsyncResult>上一次调用 EndWrite

trans-unit.source: EndWrite will block until the I/O operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: EndWrite 将阻止，直到 I/O 操作已完成。

trans-unit.source: The pending asynchronous I/O request to end.
trans-unit.target: 挂起的异步 I/O 请求结束。

trans-unit.source: The asyncResult parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The asyncResult parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 清除此流的缓冲区，使得所有缓冲的数据写入到文件。

trans-unit.source: Because a buffer can be used for either reading or writing, but not both simultaneously, Flush performs two functions.
trans-unit.target: 因为缓冲区可以用于读取或写入，但不是两个同时刷新执行两个函数。

trans-unit.source: First, any data previously written to the buffer is copied to the file and the buffer is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 首先，以前向缓冲区写入任何数据复制到文件并清除缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Second, if <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A> is `true` and data was previously copied from the file to the buffer for reading, the current position within the file is decremented by the number of unread bytes in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 其次，如果<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A>是`true`和以前将数据从文件复制到缓冲区以进行读取，该文件中的当前位置将减少的缓冲区中的未读字节数。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A>

trans-unit.source: The buffer is then cleared.
trans-unit.target: 然后清除缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.Flush%28System.Boolean%29> method overload when you want to ensure that all buffered data in intermediate file buffers is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.Flush%28System.Boolean%29>方法重载时你想要确保中间文件缓冲区中的所有缓冲数据写入到磁盘。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.Flush%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file, and also clears all intermediate file buffers.
trans-unit.target: 清除此流的缓冲区并使所有缓冲的数据都写入到该文件，并清除所有中间文件缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when you want to ensure that all buffered data in intermediate file buffers is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载时你想要确保中间文件缓冲区中的所有缓冲数据写入到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to flush all intermediate file buffers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要刷新所有中间文件缓冲区;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file handle for the file that the current <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: 获取文件句柄的文件的当前<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象所封装。

trans-unit.source: Accessing this property is not permitted on an <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object, and throws an <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在不允许访问此属性<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象，并引发<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Handle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Handle%2A>。</xref:System.IO.FileStream.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The file handle for the file that the current <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: 该文件的文件句柄的当前<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象所封装。

trans-unit.source: The Handle property always generates this exception.
trans-unit.target: 句柄属性始终生成此异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object was opened asynchronously or synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象异步还是同步打开。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> objects cannot be created, unlike <xref:System.IO.FileStream>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>无法创建对象，与<xref:System.IO.FileStream>.</xref:System.IO.FileStream>不同</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>异步

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginWrite%2A>, <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginRead%2A>, <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndWrite%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndRead%2A> methods are supported on synchronous instances, with some performance penalties.
trans-unit.target: 但是， <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginWrite%2A>， <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginRead%2A>， <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndWrite%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndRead%2A>具有一些性能损失同步实例上支持的方法。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndWrite%2A> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object supports asynchronous access; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象支持异步访问; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取的长度<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Length represents the number of bytes currently in the file.
trans-unit.target: 长度表示文件中的当前字节的数。

trans-unit.source: It is not affected by isolated storage quota.
trans-unit.target: 不受独立的存储配额。

trans-unit.source: The length of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 长度<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>以字节为单位的对象。

trans-unit.source: Prevents other processes from reading from or writing to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 防止其他进程读取或写入流。

trans-unit.source: Locking a range of a file stream gives the threads of the locking process exclusive access to that range of the file stream.
trans-unit.target: 文件流的范围锁定赋予该区域的文件流的锁定的进程独占访问的线程。

trans-unit.source: The starting position of the range to lock.
trans-unit.target: 要锁定的范围的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter must be equal to or greater than 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值必须等于或大于 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to lock.
trans-unit.target: 要锁定的字节数。

trans-unit.source: position or length is negative.
trans-unit.target: position或length为负。

trans-unit.source: The file is closed.
trans-unit.target: 文件关闭。

trans-unit.source: The process cannot access the file because another process has locked a portion of the file.
trans-unit.target: 进程无法访问该文件，因为另一个进程已锁定文件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position of the current <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前的当前位置<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property works when the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时才起作用<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current position of this <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 此当前位置<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The position cannot be set to a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 不能为负数集位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies bytes from the current buffered <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object to an array.
trans-unit.target: 从当前缓冲复制字节<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>到一个数组对象。

trans-unit.source: The `buffer` parameter can be an instance of the <xref:System.Buffer> class, or an array of one of the following types: <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: `buffer`参数可以为实例<xref:System.Buffer>类或数组的以下类型之一︰ <xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Char>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.UInt64>， <xref:System.Single>，或<xref:System.Double>。</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Char> </xref:System.SByte> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Buffer>

trans-unit.source: The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in buffer at which to begin writing (index in the buffer), and the `count` parameter gives the maximum number of bytes that will be read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: `offset`参数指定了缓冲区中从其开始写入 （缓冲区中的索引） 中的字节的偏移量和`count`参数提供的最大将从此流中读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The returned value is the actual number of bytes read, or zero if the end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果已到达流结尾，则返回的值是实际数字节，则为零。

trans-unit.source: If the read operation is successful, the current position of the stream is advanced by the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取的操作成功，是通过读取的字节数高级流的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the current position of the stream is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生异常，则流的当前位置不变。

trans-unit.source: The Read method treats the `buffer` parameter as a block of bytes, regardless of its actual type.
trans-unit.target: Read 方法将`buffer`作为一个字节，而不考虑其实际类型的块的参数。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the `offset` and `count` parameters are always specified in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 同样，`offset`和`count`参数始终以字节为单位指定。

trans-unit.source: For `buffer` parameters other than byte arrays, this means that an element index must be multiplied by the element size in bytes to form a correct value for `offset` or `count`.
trans-unit.target: 有关`buffer`字节数组以外的参数，这意味着元素索引必须乘以元素大小 （字节） 以形成的正确值`offset`或`count`。

trans-unit.source: The Read method will return zero only if the end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: Read 方法将返回零，仅当已到达流结尾。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, Read always reads at least one byte from the stream before returning.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，读取始终至少&1; 个字节从流中读取在返回之前。

trans-unit.source: If no data is available from the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object upon a call to Read, the method will block until at least one byte of data can be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果不会从提供数据<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象在读取，调用该方法将一直阻止到至少一个字节的数据可以返回。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The offset in the buffer at which to begin writing.
trans-unit.target: 在此处开始写入的缓冲区中的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 最大读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 总字节数读入 buffer 。

trans-unit.source: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: 这可能小于请求的字节数的如果很多字节当前不可用，或零个如果已到达流结尾。

trans-unit.source: Reads a single byte from the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object in isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 读取单个字节从<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>独立存储中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer value read from the isolated storage file.
trans-unit.target: 从独立的存储文件中读取的 8 位无符号的整数值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle"></xref> object that represents the operating system file handle for the file that the current <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle"></xref>表示该文件的操作系统文件句柄的对象，当前<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象所封装。

trans-unit.source: The SafeFileHandle property is not supported and always generates an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException> exception.
trans-unit.target: SafeFileHandle 属性不受支持，始终生成<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>异常。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle"></xref> object that represents the operating system file handle for the file that the current <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle"> </xref>表示该文件的操作系统文件句柄的对象，当前<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象所封装。

trans-unit.source: The SafeFileHandle property always generates this exception.
trans-unit.target: SafeFileHandle 属性始终生成此异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current position of this <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 设置此当前位置<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>为指定的值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> objects support positioning beyond the length of the stream, others will throw an exception in this case.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象支持流的长度超出定位，其他人在这种情况下将引发异常。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The new position of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新位置<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin>值。</xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin>

trans-unit.source: The new position in the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的新位置<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The origin must be one of the values.
trans-unit.target: origin 必须是值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of this object to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 设置此长度到指定的对象 value 。

trans-unit.source: If the specified `value` is less than the current length of the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object, the stream is truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定`value`的当前长度少于<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象，则流被截断。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: If the specified `value` is larger than the current length of the stream, the stream is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定`value`大于当前的长度的流，则流被扩展。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is expanded, the contents of the stream between the old and the new length are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果流已展开，旧和新的长度之间流的内容是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: In order to use this method, an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object must support both writing and seeking.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象必须支持写入和查找。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The new length of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新长度<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: value is a negative number.
trans-unit.target: value为负数。

trans-unit.source: Allows other processes to access all or part of a file that was previously locked.
trans-unit.target: 允许其他进程访问以前锁定的文件的全部或部分。

trans-unit.source: The starting position of the range to unlock.
trans-unit.target: 解锁范围的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter must be equal to or greater than 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值必须等于或大于 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to unlock.
trans-unit.target: 要解锁的字节数。

trans-unit.source: position or length is negative.
trans-unit.target: position或length为负。

trans-unit.source: Writes a block of bytes to the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object using data read from a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 将字节块写入<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象使用从字节数组中读取的数据。

trans-unit.source: The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in the `buffer` at which to begin reading, and the `count` parameter gives the number of bytes that will be written to this <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object.
trans-unit.target: `offset`参数指定了中的字节的偏移量`buffer`从此处开始读取，和`count`参数指定了将写入到这的字节数<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: If the write operation is successful, the current position of the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object is advanced by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 如果写入操作成功的当前位置<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象高级通过写入的字节数。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the current position of the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生异常的当前位置<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>对象保持不变。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in buffer from which to begin.
trans-unit.target: 从此处开始的缓冲区中的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 最大写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The write attempt exceeds the quota for the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 写入尝试次数超过的配额<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Writes a single byte to the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将单个字节写入<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The byte value to write to the isolated storage file.
trans-unit.target: 要写入独立的存储文件的字节值。

trans-unit.source: The write attempt exceeds the quota for the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 写入尝试次数超过的配额<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>对象。
